content: *keeping your baby warm no problem this hood in patons astra will keep baby cozy in an exciting shade range patons yarns * skill level intermediate **materials** **patons astra** 50 g/1 75 oz 147 m/161 yds **contrast a ** hot pink 08416 1 1 ball **contrast b ** emerald 02708 1 1 ball *2 colors 1 ball each* sizes 3 5 mm u s 4 and 4 mm u s 6 circular knitting needles 16 \ 40 cm long or size needed to obtain gauge 1 stitch holder written instructions are provided in pdf download november 2012
